column5: Yeah you can say that again What's going on with the site??  or should I say with the hosting service provider?
I was just replying to Brian's thread and Poof!!!  What did I do this time?????
Ask the Server to wipe yer ass next time Roy  ....Oh....the way they fix things, you won't be able to sit for a week.

Looks like they have moved us to another server again.. said it was a hardware issue.. Even with the hiccups, were still up 99 percent of the time, its just sucks when it goes down. Seems pretty quick to me today. I think what happens, (although its hard to get this from the isp) is that they have more than one client on a particular server and load that server up to capacity and every 6 months or so strange things happen and some "larger' clients need to be moved. I imagine going to our own managed server would help, but that is cost prohibitive. Why don't we change just ISP's you ask, well we host with the same people that designed the software, so that there can be no blame game.. i.e. the host telling us its the software causing the problem, and then the software designer telling us its a hardware problem, nothings perfect....
I see posts for 8 am and earlier this morning. I wasn't able to get on the board until 9:15 am????? I tried several times last night and was not able to get anywhere but on to PM (Messenger).
NOT YOU !!! i did it while sending a PM. I didnt know that SEND meant Small Explosion Now Detonates
Paul I was just trying to get to a PM from you and POOF also so I got back on today after work and all is good WOOHOO
shhhhh dont tell everyone or we will be baned from  from using PM.
